TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientFormsIdentity extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Security.Principal.IIdentity
Public Class ClientFormsIdentity Implements IDisposable, IIdentity
public ref class ClientFormsIdentity : IDisposable, System::Security::Principal::IIdentity

summary.span: 表示已使用窗体身份验证通过客户端应用程序服务身份验证的用户标识。

span.span: Represents a user identity authenticated for client application services by using forms authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端应用程序服务功能使用此类来表示经过身份验证的用户。The client application services feature uses this class to represent an authenticated user. 当你配置应用程序使用客户端应用程序服务和 forms 身份验证时，你可以通过调用来进行验证用户`static`方法。When you configure your application to use client application services and forms authentication, you can authenticate a user by calling the `static` method. 身份验证后，你可以检索对当前的引用实例通过属性通过检索`static`属性。After authentication, you can retrieve a reference to the current instance through the property of the retrieved through the `static` property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/client-application-services.md). 通常会访问对象作为引用以避免直接依赖于此类。You will typically access a object as an reference to avoid a direct dependency on this class. 你可以确定用户是否已验证通过检查的标识属性。You can determine whether a user is authenticated by checking the property of the identity. 但是，适用于 Windows，但不是能为客户端应用程序服务，则可能会验证该用户。However, the user may be authenticated for Windows, but not for client application services. 若要确定用户是否客户端应用程序服务进行身份验证，则应该还确认属性值是"ClientForms"。To determine whether the user is authenticated for client application services, you should also confirm that the property value is "ClientForms". 你必须使用显式引用来调用方法，不能由接口。You must use an explicit reference to call the method, which is not defined by the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类应用程序退出脱机状态时以静默方式重新验证用户。The following example code demonstrates how to use this class to silently revalidate a user when the application leaves the offline state. 在此示例中，事件处理程序更新的脱机状态，以匹配的复选框值。In this example, a event handler updates the offline status to match the check box value. 如果用户设置为联机状态应用程序，事件处理程序将尝试重新验证用户，通过调用方法。If the user sets the application to the online state, the event handler attempts to revalidate the user by calling the method. 但是，如果身份验证服务器不可用，事件处理程序将返回为脱机状态的应用程序。However, if the authentication server is unavailable, the event handler returns the application to the offline state. > [!NOTE] > 方法只是为了方便。The method is for convenience only. 因为它没有返回值，所以无法指示重新验证是否失败。Because it does not have a return value, it cannot indicate whether revalidation has failed. 例如，如果在服务器上更改了用户凭据，则重新验证可能会失败。Revalidation can fail, for example, if the user credentials have changed on the server. 在这种情况下，你可能要包含在服务调用失败之后显式验证用户的代码。In this case, you might want to include code that explicitly validates users after a service call fails. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的访问 Web 设置部分[演练： 使用客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/walkthrough-using-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see the Accessing Web Settings section in [Walkthrough: Using Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/walkthrough-using-client-application-services.md). [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#315](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#315)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#315](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#315)]

span.span: The cookies retrieved from the authentication service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不适合在应用程序代码中使用。This property is not meant for use in your application code. 不能有意修改通过此属性，检索到的 cookie 和它们所包含任何有用信息。You cannot meaningfully modify the cookies retrieved through this property, and they contain no useful information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常会访问对象作为引用以避免直接依赖于此类。You will typically access a object as an reference to avoid a direct dependency on this class. 你可以确定用户是否已验证通过检查的标识属性。You can determine whether a user is authenticated by checking the property of the identity. 但是，适用于 Windows，但不是能为客户端应用程序服务，则可能会验证该用户。However, the user may be authenticated for Windows, but not for client application services. 若要确定用户是否客户端应用程序服务进行身份验证，则应该还确认属性值是"ClientForms"。To determine whether the user is authenticated for client application services, you should also confirm that the property value is "ClientForms". 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用通过此属性引用，以确定用户当前是否为客户端应用程序服务进行身份验证。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property through an reference to determine whether a user is currently authenticated for client application services. 此示例假定应用程序是在默认配置中，用户无需身份验证 cookie 过期时再次登录。This example assumes that the application is in the default configuration where users are not required to log in again when the authentication cookie expires. 否则为可能表示的用户登录名已过期。Otherwise, the might indicate that the user login has expired. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常会访问对象作为引用以避免直接依赖于此类。You will typically access a object as an reference to avoid a direct dependency on this class. 你可以确定用户是否已验证通过检查的标识属性。You can determine whether a user is authenticated by checking the property of the identity. 但是，适用于 Windows，但不是能为客户端应用程序服务，则可能会验证该用户。However, the user may be authenticated for Windows, but not for client application services. 若要确定用户是否客户端应用程序服务进行身份验证，则应该还确认属性值是"ClientForms"。To determine whether the user is authenticated for client application services, you should also confirm that the property value is "ClientForms". 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用通过此属性引用，以确定用户当前是否为客户端应用程序服务进行身份验证。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property through an reference to determine whether a user is currently authenticated for client application services. 此示例假定应用程序是在默认配置中，用户无需身份验证 cookie 过期时再次登录。This example assumes that the application is in the default configuration where users are not required to log in again when the authentication cookie expires. 否则为可能表示的用户登录名已过期。Otherwise, the might indicate that the user login has expired. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). MemberSignature.Value: public void RevalidateUser ();
.method public hidebysig instance void RevalidateUser() cil managed
Public Sub RevalidateUser ()
public: void RevalidateUser();

summary.span: 通过使用缓存凭据来以静默方式验证用户身份。

span.span: Silently authenticates the user by using cached credentials.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您使用窗体身份验证来验证当前用户，类存储用户凭据，只要运行应用程序。When you use forms authentication to validate the current user, the class stores the user credentials as long as the application is running. 但是，仅验证该用户，直到身份验证 cookie 过期。However, the user is only authenticated until the authentication cookie expires. Cookie 过期后，用户必须重新验证来访问远程角色或 Web 设置服务。After the cookie expires, the user must be revalidated to access the remote roles or Web settings services. 你可以使用**服务的高级设置**对话框中，为应用程序，以自动重新验证用户，配置中所述[如何： 配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。You can use the **Advanced Settings for Services** dialog box to configure your application to automatically revalidate the user, as described in [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 但是，如果你配置你的应用程序遵守 cookie 到期时间，你可以以编程方式重新验证用户通过调用方法。However, if you configure your application to honor the cookie expiration, you can programmatically revalidate the user by calling the method. 此方法也是有用时从脱机模式切换到联机模式下，因为应用程序可能已关闭期间脱机。This method is also useful when switching from offline mode to online mode, because the application may have been shut down while offline. > [!NOTE] > 方法只是为了方便。The method is for convenience only. 因为它没有返回值，所以无法指示重新验证是否失败。Because it does not have a return value, it cannot indicate whether revalidation has failed. 例如，如果在服务器上更改了用户凭据，则重新验证可能会失败。Revalidation can fail, for example, if the user credentials have changed on the server. 在这种情况下，你可能要包含在服务调用失败之后显式验证用户的代码。In this case, you might want to include code that explicitly validates users after a service call fails. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的访问 Web 设置部分[演练： 使用客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/walkthrough-using-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see the Accessing Web Settings section in [Walkthrough: Using Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/walkthrough-using-client-application-services.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法以在应用程序退出脱机状态时以静默方式重新验证用户。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to silently revalidate a user when the application leaves the offline state. 在此示例中，事件处理程序更新的脱机状态，以匹配的复选框值。In this example, a event handler updates the offline status to match the check box value. 如果用户设置为联机状态应用程序，事件处理程序将尝试重新验证用户。If the user sets the application to the online state, the event handler attempts to revalidate the user. 但是，如果身份验证服务器不可用，事件处理程序将返回为脱机状态的应用程序。However, if the authentication server is unavailable, the event handler returns the application to the offline state. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#315](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#315)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#315](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#315)]
